segments.text: Of course , they are out there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you stupid ? They are called UFOs , so not everybody can see them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean that you can them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . I can see them in my dreams .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . Their task is to send the aliens here from the outer space .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Aliens from the outer space ? Do you talk to them ? What do they look like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , OK , one by one , please ! They look like robots , but they can speak . Their mission is to make friends with human beings .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That means that you talk to them ? In which language ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course in English , they learn English on Mars too .
segments.speaker: S2
